ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating an Interchange Concerns Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Interchange Concerns') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR( ISBLANK(NS_OperationsManagementContact__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Operations Management Contact prior to closing the Case.
